title: Rain Spoils AAG Closing Ceremony
content:
Nigerian News Headlines Today | Breaking Newspapers News 

By Sab Osuji In Brazzaville: What was supposed to be a fitting end to the 11th All African Games here in Congo Brazzaville was rubbished by rain which fell minutes before the closing ceremony could get underway, Completesportsnigeria.com reports. The […] 

The post appeared first on Nigerian News Headlines Today | Breaking Newspapers News .
